title: Haier 220 L Direct Cool Single Door 4 Star Refrigerator with Mirror Glass Door  (Mirror Glass, HRD-2204PMG-E)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Refrigerator Unit, Warranty Card, Guide Booklet
product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years Warranty on Compressor from Haier
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship

product_description.Quick Ice-making: Thanks to the long condenser coils and heavy-duty PUF insulation, this refrigerator makes sure that the cooling is sealed, fresh, and intact. This way, you can get ice cubes in about an hour so that you can enjoy cool and refreshing drinks whenever you like.
product_description.Toughened Glass Shelves: Equipped with toughened glass shelves, this refrigerator can withstand weights of up to 120 kg. This way, you can store many pots and pans of food without breaking the shelves.

review:
Mostly recommended to middle class family..!
Mirror glass look like awesome!Its gives beauty to my home.Image shows product brown in colour.but it available with fully mirror glass.220 L capacity enough for small families.
And Ekart logistics deliver the product at correct time.

Thanks to Haier, Flipkart and Ekart.

Review : ✔️

Model 220 Liter Red Spiral black colour Mirror Finish.

Pros : ✔️

Very fast ice making capacity 30 40 minutes ✔️
Efficient cooling ✔️
Mirror Finish top quality front fiberglass ✔️
Small light weight optimum for 4 member family ✔️
Toughen glass top quality ✔️
Fast delivery brand new no scrach ✔️

Cons : ⭕

Price for mirror glass is 2k more than normal ❌
Accesories like egg basket ice tray very small ❌
Only 2 legs in front back have no legs ❌
Compressor At back have fitted at foot level ❌
Whole back weight of fridge at compressor ❌


Conclusion :✔️ if looking for good looking and fast
cooling then buy it.
Super awesome refrigerator I like it design super Haier all ways best
look wise its a clear winner and performance too works like a charm but the only problem is noise its kind a bit noisey at times only thing that i feel bad abt this fridge.
very nice product and good quality

I received a product within delivery period and I appreciate Ekart logistics for timely delivering the product and the product design looks much pretty and with mirror glass on the door added much more beauty

I have received bit damaged product due to transportation so complaint given and immediately service guy responded and rectified the same

..... overall satisfied with Flipkart
